name: It's Not Me It's You!
description:
Delay your inevitable sorrow with It's Not Me It's You!

What’s more fun than getting broken up with?! Cause mayhem to keep your dead relationship alive, for at least a precious few minutes.

How To Play

Your partner is going to break up with you no matter what, the only thing you can do is delay the inevitable! Interact with the objects in the environment and correctly answer your partners questions to delay their inevitable breakup but be careful not to break anything!

Mouse - Move hand horizontally and vertically

W/S - Slide hand across table

A/D - Rotate hand

Space/Left Mouse Click - Pick up object

Created for Ludum Dare 50 by @indigi_bot, @LyndonRobertson , @johnwlivingston and Chaylee Allen

Special thanks to Audrey-Anne Boucher, Tanner Steele, and Shawn Faser for support and suggestions during the jam.
